title: Posters for Social Change
description: I created a series of three posters for social change. I focused on the issue of corporate corruption in our society. By combining well known corporate logos with bitmapped images of impactful scenes I was able to create an effective series of work that provokes deeper thinking.

title: Meiji Menu
description: I created a new menu for a local Fayetteville restaurant. I strived to create a clean and elegant look, matching the unique aesthetic of the restaurant. I used a combination of typography and color to create a menu that is easy to read and visually appealing. The menu features a variety of dishes, each with its own unique description and price.

title: Process Book
description: Over the course of the Fall 2024 semester, I produced a process book. Based off of the prompt, "Do, Make Think", I created a three part book based off of my motivations, inspirations, and culminations throughout my college experience so far. I included material from each of the classes I was participating in that semester to create a holistic view of my work and process.

title: Enneagram Brand Identity
description: Using my results from the "Enneagram" personality test I created this brand. I aimed to communicate the traits my test results showed through visual cues and a unique brand application. Additionally I wanted to create a logo that used imagery related to my personality's traits, so I created this logo which combines a shield with the name of my personality type. The project culminated in me mocking up an imaginary adventure card game to reflect my research and traits.
